16 March 2010

38 – Marco & Cary

by Jim McKeeth

Visiting with Marco Cantu and Cary Jensen.

  • Marco's Delphi 2010 Handbook is available.  You can get the print version or the PDF.
  • Delphi Developer Days 2010 is taking enrollment . . .
  • Marco has a REST Whitepaper and series of videos he also had a Webinar you can watch on demand.
  • Cary has a Unicode Migration Whitepaper as well as an upcoming webinar on Unicode.
  • Cary will be at the ADUG Autumn Symposium in Australia.
  • Cary and Loy are working on a new Advantage database book.
  • Future features of Delphi and the Client Dataset.

If you have any other questions or comments for Marco or Cary you can leave them here, or catch them online:

Marco Cantu

  • Blog.MarcoCantu.com
  • Twitter.com/MarcoCantu
  • Facebook

Cary Jensen

  • CaryJensen.Blogspot.com
  • JensenDataSystems.com
  • Twitter.com/CaryJensen
